charaepi_ch0021_90_green/2301_1101_0100_:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] saw a Pokémon
flying by with a crackling sound.
charaepi_ch0021_90_green/2301_1101_0200_:
[EN:Gen Ref="255" M="He" F="She" ] followed it, which led [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="him" F="her" ] to none other than
Blue!
charaepi_ch0021_90_green/2301_0402_0700_: Haha, I see! So Zapdos led you here, huh?
charaepi_ch0021_90_green/2301_1201_0800_:
You might already know this, but Zapdos is one of
the legendary bird Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0021_90_green/2301_1201_0900_:
I met it while I was training in Kanto after losing
to Red.
charaepi_ch0021_90_green/2301_1201_1000_:
The moment I saw it, it was like a jolt of electricity
ran up my spine.
charaepi_ch0021_90_green/2301_1201_1100_:
I knew that together with Zapdos, I could get
ahead of Red and Leaf!
charaepi_ch0021_90_green/2301_1201_1200_:
Well...after that, I learned they’d also teamed up
with Moltres and Articuno.
charaepi_ch0021_90_green/2301_1201_1300_: To be honest, it was pretty frustrating.
charaepi_ch0021_90_green/2301_1201_1400_:
I thought I was gonna be the only one to partner
up with a legendary bird Pokémon!
charaepi_ch0021_90_green/2301_1201_1500_: But...I guess it’s interesting this way.
charaepi_ch0021_90_green/2301_1201_1600_:
The moment I start thinking I’m getting a step
ahead, they catch up to me right away.
charaepi_ch0021_90_green/2301_1201_1700_: I guess that’s what rivals do, though.
charaepi_ch0021_90_green/2301_1201_1800_: I bet some might call it destiny, too.
charaepi_ch0021_90_green/2301_1201_1900_:
Have you ever felt that sort of destiny,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?
charaepi_ch0021_90_green/2301_0402_2300_: Well, I think meeting you was my destiny!
charaepi_ch0021_90_green/2301_1201_2400_:
The first time I ever felt that sort of destiny was
when I met Red and Leaf.
charaepi_ch0021_90_green/2301_1201_2500_:
I don’t know why, but I somehow felt that it was
the start of a long-lasting connection...
charaepi_ch0021_90_green/2301_1201_2600_:
I’ve gotten as strong as I am now because they
were there.
charaepi_ch0021_90_green/2301_1201_2700_: Red and Leaf will probably always be my rivals.
charaepi_ch0021_90_green/2301_1201_2800_:
We battle all-out with each other and keep going
back and forth, winning and losing... And that’s
how we get stronger!
charaepi_ch0021_90_green/2301_1201_2900_:
But obviously, Zapdos and I are gonna be the last
ones standing!
charaepi_ch0021_90_green/2301_0401_3100_:
Heh, thanks! I’ll definitely live up to your
expectations!
charaepi_ch0021_90_green/2301_0402_3300_:
Sure am! Together with Zapdos, I’m gonna become
the most powerful Trainer in the world for sure
this time!
